name: Prograils
tagline: Software house for businesses with goals
description:
At Prograils, we build web and mobile apps for businesses that move forward.
Clutch recognized us as a Leading Top Software and Web Development Firm (2015) and a Top B2B Company in Poland (2018).
Ruby on Rails, Elixir/Phoenix, React and HTML5 are our tools for the web. Swift, Java, Kotlin and React Native help us build mobile apps for both iOS and Android.
Over 7 years in the industry, weâ€™ve worked with clients from startups to big enterprises. It made us able to establish long-term relationships with partners from all over the world, including Denmark, the Netherlands, USA and the UK.
Still, we are curious about new ideas that make companies thrive.
Have one? Share it with us: hello@prograils.com
